thread.title: Very good hotel, different and stylish with a FREE mini-bar
thread.title_full: Very good hotel, different and stylish with a FREE mini-bar - Review of Hotel Augustin - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SteveBMidlands_UK
title: Very good hotel, different and stylish with a FREE mini-bar
text:
We stayed here for three nights in spring 2017, and found the room (superior) to be very clean and tastefully decorated
Checkin was quick and friendly, in fact all the staff throughout our stay were very friendly.
The rooms and hotel are very "retro" and being of a certain age, they reminded me of my youth.
The hotel breakfast is good and contains lots of choice and the quality of the food was excellent.
They also provide snacks and tea/coffee for free during the evenings but the best stuff tends to disappear quite early, but there was always something available both sweet and savoury.
